descriptions.extensive: The planet is surrounded by an impressive collection of rings.
descriptions.small: A faint ring is visible orbiting the planet.
descriptions.close: It orbits quickly and closely to its parent star.
descriptions.habitable: The planet is in its star's habitable zone.
descriptions.elliptical: It has a strange elliptical orbit that takes it really close and then very far from its star.
descriptions.far: It orbits very far from its parent star, taking decades to complete an orbit.
descriptions.tidally locked: The planet is constantly illuminated on one side and in perpetual darkness on the other.
descriptions.slow: Its day-night cycle is very slow, one day on there is several Earth days.
descriptions.fast: The planet spins very fast on its axis.
descriptions.earth-like: A day on there is approximately as long as on Earth.
descriptions.Super Jupiter: This is planet which is far more massive than Jupiter.
descriptions.Gas Giant: This planet is a gas giant.
descriptions.Small Giant: This is a gas giant, similar to the size of Neptune.
descriptions.Super Earth: This is a rocky planet, but it's much more massive than Earth.
descriptions.Earth-sized: The planet is roughly the size of Earth.
descriptions.Small Rocky: The planet is similar in size to Mars.
descriptions.Dwarf Planet: This is a very small planet, roughly the size of Pluto.
drones destroyed: Due to some freak event, our drones seem to have been destroyed before sending back data on the planet.
An unknown cause has rendered our drones non-functional.
Sadly, our drones were not able to report any data from the surface.
Unfortunately, no data seems to have come back from the drones, and we've lost their signal.
descriptions.Hellishly Hot: Its surface temperature seems to be high enough to melt lead.
descriptions.Hot: Its surface temperature seems to be above the boiling point of water.
descriptions.Warm: Its surface temperature seems to be warmer than Earth's, but still bearable.
descriptions.Temperate: Its surface temperature seems to be about the same as Earth's.
descriptions.Cold: Its surface temperature seems to be colder than Earth's, but still survivable.
descriptions.Frozen: Its surface temperature seems to be freezing.
descriptions.Icy: Its surface temperature seems to be below the boiling point of methane.
descriptions.No Atmosphere: The planet seems to have no atmosphere.
descriptions.Thick Atmosphere: Its atmosphere seems to be thick enough to sustain life.
descriptions.Acid Atmosphere: Its atmosphere is thick, but we have detected some strange compounds.
No Life: There is no life detected on this planet.
There is a slight probability that the planet has some type of life on it already.
Primordial Life: There is no life detected on this planet.
There is a slight probability that the planet has some type of life on it already.
Animal Life: There is no life detected on this planet.
There is a slight probability that the planet has some type of life on it already.
There is a high probability that the planet is home to living organisms.
Advanced Life: There is a slight probability that the planet has some type of life on it already.
There is a high probability that the planet is home to living organisms.
We have detected radio waves and artificial lighting from orbit!
Former Advanced Life: There is no life detected on this planet.
There is a slight probability that the planet has some type of life on it already.
